title: The ―Site Engineer‖ must hold a minimum diploma in Civil / Construction Engineering / Construction Management or any other equivalent qualification in the field of Civil Engineering
clause_text: The ―Site Engineer‖ must hold a minimum diploma in Civil / Construction Engineering / Construction Management or any other equivalent qualification in the field of Civil Engineering.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
